text.text: All broad tools require the Tinker's Anvil to be created, and to swap parts. Most require 4 tool parts, and start with only 2 upgrade slots and 1 ability slot.

Large tools have both attack bonuses and modifiers like small tools, and many more have traits. In addition, many tools have a durability or a mining speed modifier that act similarly to the attack modifier, affecting both base stats and stat bonuses from modifiers. Finally, all broad tools have the "two handed" trait, which prevents use of the offhand unless a modifier such as offhanded is applied.
